de.mixedfx.logging

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mixedfx.logging.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Turn all Loggers on / off by calling turnAllOn() or turnAllOff()! Turn the Logger off by calling Logger.setLevel(Level) with Level.OFF! See Level logic here: http://www.tutorialspoint.com/log4j/log4j_logging_levels.htm
